description:
Forget the traditional rules about body shape, closet organization and color coordination. It can be so complicated and who has time for it? Style for Happiness is filled with practical advice to simplify your closet and to help you develop a personal style that makes you feel empowered and creative, everyday. You´ll end the course inspired and with confidence in knowing that what you put on looks gorgeous and serves you well.

You´ll get a step-by-step guide on where to find outfit/style ideas, and how to create fresh new outfits with what you already have in your closet. Plus you´ll learn how, when and where to shop; how to work accessories like a styling pro, interpret the trends when you want to look more stylish and some beauty tips to make you shine.

You´ll look fabulishious…is that even a word? Ask Beyoncé!

Pour your favorite beverage and let´s unleash your personal style!
title: Style for Happiness: Develop your Style, Feel Empowered!
